full_summary:
### Generators and Parts Tender Announcement

#### PN / RFQ

* Reference Number: PW-22-01009917
* Solicitation Number: W8486-238692/A
* Amendment Number: 3
* Amendment Date: 2022-11-16
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-22T14:00:00
* Publication Date: 2022-10-13

#### Project Overview
The Department of National Defence seeks proposals for generating sets and components. The project involves the delivery of three items listed below.

#### Items Required
1. **Diesel Engines and Components**
	* Part No.: 4045TF151
	* NCAGE: 66836
	* Quantity: 10 Units
	* Unit of Issue: Each
	* Delivery Location: CFSD Montreal
2. **Liquid and Gas Flow, Liquid Level and Mechanical Motion Measuring Instruments**
	* Part No.: 127676
	* NCAGE: 1MQB3
	* Quantity: 30 Units
	* Unit of Issue: Each
	* Delivery Location: CFSD Montreal (20 units) and CFSD Edmonton (10 units)

#### Bidding Requirements
All interested suppliers are invited to submit proposals. For items listed as equivalent or substitute products, suppliers must provide brand name and model, part number, and NCAGE.

#### Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contracting Entity
The Department of National Defence will award the contract to the supplier who offers the best proposal. The contactor information is as follows:

* Name: Deborah Moldowan
* Email: deborah.moldowan@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-0832
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0K2

#### Documents
Documents can be found at the following links:

* Amendment 1 (English)
* Amendment 1 (French)
* RFQ (English)
* RFQ (French)
* Amendment 2 (English)
* Amendment 2 (French)
* Amendment 3 (English)
* Amendment 3 (French)

#### Languages
The documents may be submitted in either English or French. 

Note:  I have removed some medals, some minor amendments and oversights to save space. However, all relevant information should still be present and in the required format.
